item.description:
Allan Hughes, DC will be leading this teleseminar. Some of the points he'll talk about are --

Normally, we rely on our mind for everything we do. What would happen if once in a while our soul were in charge? What would that be like?

You don't have to leave your house for this program. Just pick up the phone. The call-in number is: 1-712-432-3900. When prompted, enter your access code: 1617505 followed by the # sign.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: When Your Soul Is in Charge
